website_summaries.verdict: Individual surfboard racks for people who want a simple and protective solution for transporting boards on their car.
pros: Large padded racks hold up to 4 longboards or 6 shortboards at once
Padding is square in shape for better grip against the roof and surface of the surfboards
cons: The included D-rings may start to loosen if surfboards are left on top of the car for a long period of time

customer_reviews.title: Great for Jetta until it rains...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased FCS's double soft surfboard rack to take 2 surfboards to the beach (~3hr drive). The straps were very easy to setup and fit great on my 2001 Jetta Sedan. I was able to quickly put the boards on and off the car when we decided to switch to a different beach. They were perfect until it started raining...All 4 locations where the straps came into the car started gushing with water and I ended up with a small lake under my shorts...
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Anne Dyer

customer_reviews.title: get the d ring!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. got them after i tried another brand but returned those. its a very simple design but you want the d ring instead of the spring leaded clip/claw type. its way more secure, and you want that extra security when you have a $600+ board flying down the road at 70mph. After the first time or 2, you can put this on your car in 2 min or less, and then another 2 min to put your board or boards on. Trust me, get these, dont even get the other fcs ones that have the spring loaded clips, get the d ring!
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: First time with the pass through the car soft rack (previous ones attached to the rails) and I was not expecting to like it but it was fine
customer_reviews.text: Quite impressed with this rack. First time with the pass through the car soft rack (previous ones attached to the rails) and I was not expecting to like it but it was fine. I have used it with a single longboard about five times and it was great. It didn't appear to slip and the straps were tight when it came time to unload it. More expensive than many other soft racks but some of the cheaper ones had reviewers indicating the straps were tearing - perhaps you get what you pay more. The nice soft case was a bonus - took it on a long plane flight and just carried it on with me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & takes a minute to install.  Simple design that works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for a twenty five year old FCS soft rack. The new one is much better made. Thicker straps, stronger buckles. Also comes in a new little case to store it. Great rack.
customer_reviews.author: J. Raposa

customer_reviews.title: Portable, Sturdy, Secure
customer_reviews.text: Easy to throw on/take off my car - takes about 2 minutes to set both straps up from the time I take them out of the handy case to the time I’m ready to put my board up. Securely holds my longboard for hour-long trips up to 70 mph. The D-ring definitely locks the webbing into place but is super easy to “unlock” when taking off a board or the straps. The front strap is pretty close to my head, but that may just be my car (Honda Civic). A little pricey, but you get what you pay for with these straps: a sturdy, secure, easy-to-assemble, well-designed, portable surfboard transportation system.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent with big board
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my heavy ~9ft board on my full sized vehicle without discernible damage to my roof. Also despite being a double rack it works well with only one board as long as you cinch it tight, even in higher wind/bridges. Very easy to install and remove.
customer_reviews.author: sinisterLefty

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works great! The d-rings are a fine lock-down system
customer_reviews.text: Fits and works great! The d-rings are a fine lock-down system. I used it to drive 200 miles at 75 mph up 95 to Cocoa and it held good and tight with less wind noise than the last hard rack I had. Take it off when not in use, though, because if it rains the rain soaks the straps and your interior will be completely soaked after an overnight rain. Similarly, if you're driving in the rain for more than a little while it will start leaking too. This sucks but I guess you can't have everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I'm infinitely happy with this product. Using this rack I was able to transport a 9'+ longboard going highway speed no problem. All the material is clearly top quality, metal components are smoothed perfectly. Straps are strong and fasten tightly. Numbering system is easy to understand, makes tying down straps a breeze every time without worry of confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Szczypinski

customer_reviews.title: Great racks!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and work great. It takes some time to figure straps out!
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It works well. The board will bounce a bit, which is a bit unnerving, but you can still drive 70 on the freeway with no real worries of the board flying off.
customer_reviews.author: mbarry

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Simple, compactable, nice storage soft case, works well with two boards on a long trip up the coast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... boy/girl twins that has never strapped anything to a good -- I love it
customer_reviews.text: As a single mom of 13 year old boy/girl twins that has never strapped anything to a good -- I love it! Self explanatory....me & my kids strapped 2 boards up & went to the beach an hour & a half away!! I would recommend this item to everyone. And, I'm fact, 2 other families that are friends of mine are ordering it after seeing my FB post of our maiden voyage!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Make Zero Noise! The Best Soft Rack Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: The best soft rack with zero noise. It is really easy to install once you learn how to fasten the strap. I searched for a youtube clip from FCS and it helped a lot. D ring system is the best not to make noise and secures the surfboard so well. It’s worth every penny! You won’t regret buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Onesummerynight

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality
customer_reviews.text: These rock. Super high quality. I'd get the single if I could do over. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Cape

customer_reviews.title: Great soft racks for my Prius!
customer_reviews.text: Great soft racks for a 9 foot longboard on my Prius. No problems and very easy to put on. I have driven on the freeway up to 70mph with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bay

customer_reviews.title: ... this on my 2012 VW Jetta and it worked great. I live an hour from the beach and ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 2012 VW Jetta and it worked great. I live an hour from the beach and take a main highway to get their so speed was about 65 and this holds up great. Carried two over 6' boards.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: Easy ass set up. Took me 10 min. To throw my boards on top.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Ellis

customer_reviews.title: high-quality and well-built
customer_reviews.text: Everything is high-quality and well-built, though maybe just a tad over-engineered. The straps take same practice.
customer_reviews.author: Carlsbaditude

customer_reviews.title: worked great! Super strong
customer_reviews.text: Took on 2,000 mile road trip, worked great! Super strong, super easy to install and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Short

customer_reviews.title: Decent rack
customer_reviews.text: Super solid and safe water gets in when it rains though but you should already be wet from surfing soooo shouldn’t really matter
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn g

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got the job done for a summer. Held two long boards on the freeway at 70mph. Sure, made me nervous the way they danced around no matter how much I tightened them down... But never failed me...
customer_reviews.author: DaveR

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clips come loose from board bounces a lot had to buy a wratchet strap to fully secure board.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Great Racks!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Racks!! Easy on. easy off. Held my boards very securely on an 800 mile trip.
customer_reviews.author: James Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm on the drive to the beach and ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm on the drive to the beach and back. Threading the buckles takes a portion of the brain I lack, but I have a wife, so that helped.
customer_reviews.author: Book Snob

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Instructions should be more detailed
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Instructions should be more detailed, but after watching Youtube, I figured it out. The only complaint that I have is that since it goes through your door jam, it will allow rain to seep into your vehicle on rainy days. I encountered a rainstorm on my way to the beach and some water came into the car. Not a lot, but enough to make me aware.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C Pettiford

customer_reviews.title: The best soft rack for cars without rain gutters
customer_reviews.text: The best soft rack for cars without rain gutters. Excellent workmanship, materials and attention to detail all at an affordable price. My setup: Honda CRV, 8', 8'6", 9', 6'4" boards. The rack could easily accommodate 2 more boards. D-Ring mechanism holds well without loosening, and an hour on the freeway (70 mph) without slippage or any annoying vibration noises (with the belts flat, no need to twist).
customer_reviews.author: Daikidoka

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: pretty good! We used it with the surfboards and with our snowboards!
customer_reviews.author: Aline ALBINO

customer_reviews.title: Meh. It's a pair of straps with pads. ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh. It's a pair of straps with pads. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and easy to use. Put two longboards on a pretty compact car securely and quickly with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mustavich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you need to carry more than two longboards.
customer_reviews.author: Guillaume

customer_reviews.title: Best soft racks I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Surf Racks really high quality look very sleek. Very soft straps high quality nylon. Don't make any noise or move around even at 50 miles an hour.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Option
customer_reviews.text: Was given a new company car that does not have racks its just a small sedan. These work great and are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent portable roof rack. Very secure and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: gntlmn5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works so well - so easy to put on and off - carries a couple good sized boards
customer_reviews.author: Claire E. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sooo good! So much worthy, very good quality. I have carried 6 boards with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diogo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very solid product. Well made and works as described. Beats buying Thule for ~$600.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Park

customer_reviews.title: Back to the drawing board for a longboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it appeared to have great reviews and maybe it does work well for certain cars and smaller boards. However, I have a Camry and a 9'2 longboard. The combination just doesn't work. I even watched a couple videos on Youtube to make sure I was using it properly but, nonetheless, it just doesn't keep the board stable. I imagine with a shorter board there would be less lift. However with the longboard, it will lift and shift side to side even at 55 mph. I now need to figure out a way how to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Harper Russell

customer_reviews.title: Guy Powell
customer_reviews.text: looks to be solidly made with good instructions on how to use it. Will update if anything changes. (more words required)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first about purchasing this item because of some of the reviews that I had read. However, I have used the racks a few times already and they work great. If you tie the straps correctly, they shouldn't slip. Just a side note: If you want to make them last longer, give them a quick rinse/soak in "FRESH" water after traveling back from the beach. In doing so, you will be washing the salt off of them. Therefor, they won't corrode and will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bickford

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular. Works exactly as expected and does so much for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bentley

customer_reviews.title: FCS double surfboard rack
customer_reviews.text: this is a great easy to use rack! We use it for our 2 8 foot soft tops. It's a great soft top rack for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: The rack was pretty good it held the board i just didnt feel 100 percent secured going at freeway speeds but all and all good product
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Quick easy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use on a 4 door sedan. Small,compact storage. Was able to leave on car without concerns they maybe stolen.
customer_reviews.author: norm e warner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used the racks for the past 4 months and they are great. Very easy to put on and take off. The do not move at all if put on properly. I've also taken the soft racks to trips on rental cars and they work very well. I have the double which I use with two long boards. Excellent quality and product.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Gaviria

customer_reviews.title: Not safe above 30mph
customer_reviews.text: This held the SUP board on my car to bring home from the shop, but it was bouncing around like crazy even at low speeds and no other cars wanted to drive near me. Used it once and immediately realized I needed to buy an actual roof rack for safety.
customer_reviews.author: stormes

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, very useful
customer_reviews.text: This is my second buy, this has a great quality with a reasonable pricing. It has a very nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Tasbihi

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done on an 05 accord. I can carry my 10ft and 7'8" at the same time. Just be careful not to scratch the roof of your car with the metal loops...and be sure to read the instructions (also there are some YouTube videos posted about the product). Worth every penny. If you're thinking about purchasing this item just do it already. Now I can surf anywhere! Peace, Love, and Rock and Roll!
customer_reviews.author: MusicManAllDay

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet, but they seem a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: fully functional.
customer_reviews.text: Look exactly like what I expected. If they work half as good as other reviews say, then I'm stoked!!!! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: jkeleig

customer_reviews.title: better options are out there
customer_reviews.text: What a dissapoinrment, not user friendly at all, better options are out there
customer_reviews.author: John Rokosz

customer_reviews.title: Great--fast and easy.
customer_reviews.text: These things rock. From the time O opened the box until I was driving away with two longboards was about three minutes. Light, secure, awesome.
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Product did not work at all, total garbage, don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work at all, total garbage, don't buy it. I'm just sorry I missed the the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice now and it is easy to install and remove. Worked well on any rental car for my 9'2" board.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Amster

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise super easy to install and my board wasn't going ANYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: Never used surf racks before. Made sure to read the instructions carefully, but otherwise super easy to install and my board wasn't going ANYWHERE! Great racks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: not what was expected does not fit longboards or SUP, barely fits a short board, save your money go get some pool noodles and cargo straps. Buckles not in use/stowed in elastic comes out from elastic and beat your paint job up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: FCS Premium Double Soft Surfboard Car Racks
product_meta.description: These soft racks are heavy duty and fit most vehicles. Perfect for the surfer loves to hit the road but doesn't want to take a big hit out of their wallet.
feature_bullets: Fits most cars, vans, SUVs/4WDs, etc.
